title: Minimum Subarrays in a Valid Split

content.content: How is the answer to ```[17,11,19,53,97,89,7,23,89,61,61,17,13,43,43,73,89,83]``` 6? Shouldn't be -1 since we can't split the subarray from index 0 to nums.size() - 2 since all occurrences of 89, and 17 need to be in the same subarray

How is the answer to ```[17,11,19,53,97,89,7,23,89,61,61,17,13,43,43,73,89,83]``` 6? Shouldn't be -1 since we can't split the subarray from index 0 to nums.size() - 2 since all occurrences of 89, and 17 need to be in the same subarray
